name: Fractured: Mixed Reality 3D puzzle
summary:
NEW DLC coming in August! 


Fractured offers a soothing 3D puzzle experience in Mixed Reality right in your home. Reassemble 3D models that have shattered into pieces, all within the cozy atmosphere of your room. Immerse yourself in the flow of puzzling with pieces floating around you, accompanied by relaxing lo-fi music in the background. 

Enjoy an immersive take on an old time hobby by putting together the models piece by piece. Play either seated or standing! Simply drag an object from the menu out...
